locations.name: Phuket
locations.description: Thailand's largest island known for beautiful beaches, clear waters, and vibrant nightlife.

locations.name: Krabi
locations.description: Known for its stunning limestone karsts, beautiful beaches, and relaxed atmosphere.

locations.name: Patong
locations.description: Phuket's most famous beach resort town with a vibrant nightlife.

locations.name: Karon
locations.description: A more relaxed beach area in Phuket with beautiful white sand.

locations.name: Ao Nang
locations.description: The main beach resort in Krabi with access to offshore islands.

locations.name: Railay
locations.description: A stunning peninsula accessible only by boat, famous for its rock climbing.

locations.name: Phi Phi Islands
locations.description: A group of islands with stunning beaches and clear waters, popular for day trips.

locations.name: Koh Samui
locations.description: Thailand's second-largest island known for its palm-fringed beaches, coconut groves and dense, mountainous rainforest.

locations.name: Chaweng
locations.description: The busiest and most commercial beach on Koh Samui with powder-soft white sand.

locations.name: Koh Phangan
locations.description: An island in the Gulf of Thailand known for its monthly Full Moon Party and pristine beaches.

locations.name: Koh Tao
locations.description: A small island known as a diving paradise with coral reefs and abundant marine life.

hotels.name: Patong Beach Hotel
hotels.description: A comfortable hotel located near Patong Beach with modern amenities.

hotels.name: Karon View Resort
hotels.description: A luxurious resort with stunning views of Karon Beach.

hotels.name: Ao Nang Cliff Resort
hotels.description: A resort built on the cliffside with panoramic views of Ao Nang Bay.

hotels.name: Railay Princess Resort
hotels.description: A luxurious resort nestled between limestone cliffs on Railay Beach.

hotels.name: Phi Phi Island Village
hotels.description: An exclusive resort on Phi Phi Island with private beach access.

hotels.name: Chaweng Regent Beach Resort
hotels.description: Luxury beachfront resort on Chaweng Beach with lush tropical gardens.

hotels.name: Samui Paradise Resort
hotels.description: A peaceful retreat with traditional Thai-style villas and a private beach.

hotels.name: Haad Rin Beach Resort
hotels.description: Beachfront resort on the famous Full Moon Party beach with comfortable bungalows.

hotels.name: Koh Tao Coral Grand Resort
hotels.description: Beachfront resort with direct access to prime snorkeling and diving spots.

activities.name: Patong Nightlife Tour
activities.description: Experience the vibrant nightlife of Patong Beach with a guided tour.

activities.name: Phi Phi Island Boat Tour
activities.description: A full-day boat tour around the stunning Phi Phi Islands.

activities.name: Four Islands Tour
activities.description: Visit four of Krabi's most beautiful islands in one day.

activities.name: Rock Climbing at Railay
activities.description: Try rock climbing on Railay's famous limestone cliffs with experienced guides.

activities.name: Phuket Old Town Tour
activities.description: Explore the cultural heritage of Phuket Old Town.

activities.name: Elephant Sanctuary Visit
activities.description: Visit an ethical elephant sanctuary and interact with rescued elephants.

activities.name: Snorkeling at Coral Island
activities.description: Enjoy snorkeling at the vibrant coral reefs of Coral Island.

activities.name: Emerald Pool and Hot Springs
activities.description: Visit Krabi's natural Emerald Pool and relax in hot springs.

activities.name: Full Moon Party
activities.description: Experience the world-famous full moon beach party with fire shows and music.

activities.name: Samui Island Tour
activities.description: Explore Koh Samui's highlights including the Big Buddha, waterfalls, and local markets.

activities.name: Angthong Marine Park Tour
activities.description: Day trip to the stunning Angthong National Marine Park with snorkeling and kayaking.

activities.name: Scuba Diving at Koh Tao
activities.description: Discover the underwater world at one of the world's best diving locations.

activities.name: Thai Cooking Class
activities.description: Learn to prepare authentic Thai dishes with local ingredients and techniques.

activities.name: Kayaking at Ang Thong
activities.description: Kayak through the stunning limestone formations of Ang Thong Marine Park.

itineraries.name: Quick Phuket Escape
itineraries.description: A short getaway to experience the highlights of Phuket.

itineraries.name: Phuket & Krabi Adventure
itineraries.description: Experience the best of both Phuket and Krabi in this action-packed itinerary.

itineraries.name: Southern Thailand Explorer
itineraries.description: Comprehensive exploration of Southern Thailand's most beautiful destinations.

itineraries.name: Ultimate Thailand Beach Vacation
itineraries.description: The most comprehensive tour of Thailand's southern beaches and islands.

itineraries.name: Thai Gulf Island Hopper
itineraries.description: Experience the best of Thailand's Gulf islands with this perfect week-long adventure.

itineraries.name: Samui Getaway
itineraries.description: A short but sweet escape to the beautiful island of Koh Samui.

itineraries.name: Southern Thai Islands Explorer
itineraries.description: The perfect 5-day island hopping adventure in Southern Thailand.
